alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Augustine South to Hastings. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, Guana River State Park and Spuds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
